summary: Pure retexture mod of skyrim villages. No esps, no meshes, no conflicts, only high quality textures With 4K, 2K Resolution made from scratch with love and kind heart. Now your villagers will eat potatoes with smile or roll actively in their graves if you killed them all.
descriptionHtml:
Texture replacer for skyrim villages. All textures are optimized. No words needed, just see some images and roll in your.aarrrr..eeeat popatoes with smile ofcourse !

=========================================================================================
All Screens were made with Natural Lighting and Atmospherics ENB.(KUDOS To Confidence Man!)
=========================================================================================
So far covered textures:
farmhouse01.dds
farmhouse01_n.dds
farmhouselod01.dds
farmhouselod01_n.dds
stonefloor01.dds
stonefloor01_n.dds
stonewall01.dds
stonewall01_n.dds
stonewall02.dds
stonewall02_n.dds
thatch02.dds
thatch02_n.dds
thatch03.dds
thatch03_n.dds
thatchinterior01.dds
thatchinterior01_n.dds
woodpost02.dds
woodpost02_n.dds
woodwalkway01.dds
woodwalkway01_n.dds
woodwall01.dds
woodwall01_n.dds
======================
Installation:
Very basic. Just extract files into your Skyrim/data/ and replace files if promted.
Uninstall:
Delete "so far covered textures" in your Skyrim/data/textures/architecture/farmhouse
author: lKocMoHaBTl
